caption: Super fun experience with the kids. We did the game Jungle quest. Our operator Octave was amazing! Great person with excellent service!!!
Octave is really great guy!! The place is perfect for families!!!

Reserved a 90min time slot at 6pm on a Wednesday, arrived about 30min early and was able to start as soon as I got there. Stephen and Melody were super friendly and helpful. Great location and setup. Played Wanderer and had a great time figuring out the puzzles and exploring. Would recommend to anyone who has the extra time and wants to try something new or anyone who enjoys video games. Thanks again for a great time.
Another great visit to Virtual Time. Family fun outing with boys 9 and 12. Guillaume was great making sure everyone was under control with their games.  5 stars!

I went there about a week ago with three of my friends to do a virtual escape game for my birthday. The staff was amazing and the game was a really fun group experience. I can't wait to go back to this place!

Very great place to visit and experience if you havenâ€™t ever tried VR, I would recommend playing Crisis and Arizona sunshine, staff are amazing and friendly especially Mia who helped us out whenever we needed anything or anything we didnâ€™t understand.
Loved the experience here. Great selection of games.
Staff is great and attractions and games are really fun!
Super!
Good experience

Each time, a very friendly welcome, help to progress in the games (and cleaning of headsets/controllers)! Even if you're not used to video games, it's a great moment of fun to share with teenagers. Good advice for choosing the game that everyone likes!

I came to play solo and it was very nice. The welcome is top notch. It was my first time and I loved it! I was sweating because I was pushing myself so hard, and the very nice coach brought me something to dry out ðŸ˜Š (there is also fresh water available, very practical!) Thank you team, I will come back soon and next time as a team

Very good experience. The place is friendly, the equipment is quality and the team takes great care of its customers. There is a large selection of escape rooms as well as many games. We were not disappointed and had a very fun hour and a half!

I just had an incredible time at Virtualtime! As soon as we arrived, we were impressed by the warm welcome and professionalism of the agent. The facilities are modern and impeccably maintained. VR games are variable and top quality/price level. We had a lot of fun. The zombies have come back to beat you ðŸ¤£. â€¦
I loved the experience and Yanis was the best staff, his colleague was less so.

Amazing !! I discovered this nugget with my mom. We did horror mode and had some fun ðŸ¤£ðŸ¤£ The 2 gentlemen who welcomed us were extremely polite and kind!! I strongly advise you to do this experience!! â€¦

5 minutes walk from the house... we come regularly to play Arizona Sunshine 2. According to the management, the experience is good or even excellent. The installation and absence of BUG is essential for an ideal game.

We were well received, good communication before the session.  Unfortunately, upon arrival we were surprised because the feature we wanted (Google Earth) was not working.  Then we decided to look at something else and do an escape game but the equipment didn't work properly. We wasted a lot of time trying to resolve the issue. ultimately we didn't enjoy the experience.  It's a shame because we really liked the concept. We ended up leaving early.
Great first experience! Great welcome! And very good customer service. Thank you for this good time
A very nice family activity. The gentleman was super friendly and caring. THANKS
Super friendly welcome and top experience, I recommend this center to all VR enthusiasts!
Very friendly team who listen to the players. Top organization! We had a great time!  To do again...

Two of us came with a friend, we played the horror escape game having reserved 1 hour. Very nice in principle, easy to learn, cool game, help if needed. But for the price a lot of disappointments: tendentious hardware which makes us turn around constantly to recalibrate, a non-functional controller, annoying noise due to the lack of insulation between the different game "cabins", image which follows the movement with a delay... Too many flaws for a concept that could have been very cool. Damage. We had a great time but regret having paid so much for this quality.
Great experience with the Alice escape game Thanks to Aylane for her welcome and kindness
Perfect stopover game for a 14th birthday, very nice hosts, successful virtual adventure

For a first VR experience, I really liked the one offered by VirtualTime. I chose AssassinÂ´s Creed Medusa Gate and the gaming experience is truly immersive. We don't see the time passing. The staff is very friendly and the equipment is top notch. My friend had a little trouble with her controllers (maybe used too much previously) but we had a great time. I recommend!
Great experience for a first VR escape game. The welcome is perfect, the explanations clear and the games part brilliant.

I went there with my 13 year old daughter. The welcome was very friendly, the staff gave us good advice. It was our first VR escape game so it wasn't easy at the beginning and there were only 2 of us, we didn't quite get to the end of the game but we were still able to access the final scene thanks to the host . We really enjoyed this experience.

EDITED ON 03/26/2024 The after-sales service contacted me, they were very attentive and understanding following this technical problem! I thank them greatly! And will return to test new games soon!  ---------@--- The first experience was great! Today's was much more mixed: 15 min delay on their part, technical problem (wifi a priori) which meant that one of our players was unable to participate for at least 10 min. Over 45 minutes of play, that's a lot. The facilitators were only two, (and all the spaces occupied) so not necessarily available immediately when we needed them
Very nice experience My son and I loved it

We booked with a group of 8 friends to play together and chose games specifically for that. Unfortunately we were separated into groups of 3 and 5 which meant that one of the groups played as a team of 2 against 3 which was of no interest as it was not at all balanced. The set up was not smooth at all and the staff seemed overwhelmed. We lost a lot of time and only had an extra 5 minutes. The games themselves were good but the organization around them was insufficient and this did not allow you to enjoy them properly. We do not recommend this room.
It's an incredible experience. It's easy to use. The team is very friendly and welcoming. They gave us good advice, when we get stuck they are there to help us. Top, can't wait to go back!!
First time with a friend, it was so good. The team is great, nothing to complain about, everything was explained to us in detail which is really nice. In short, we loved it. Thanks to Thomas!

Top experience! The place is super friendly and the staff welcoming! The activities are very diverse and varied and there is something for everyone, children, adolescents, adults, men, women, girls, boys...

I was there with a friend for my first VR experience. Great welcome and good experience. For an hour of immersion we were able to play 3 games, so it's worth it. I recommend the place and will surely come back.

I took my son and 6 friends yesterday, they LOVED it. On Wednesday there was almost no one there so it was a private birthday ðŸ‘Œ. The young man who took care of us was excellent, patient (and you need that with 7 12 year olds) and very available. I thank him again. There are definitely experiences to play together or Ã  la carte if the games don't appeal to some. The place is well done and pleasant. I recommend 100%.
We did an escape with two people and it was a really great experience! We are really well immersed, the material is great, the themes are very varied! I highly recommend
Great experience for our son's birthday with 5 friends. The 2 facilitators were great and super available. They stayed longer after closing with the children. Thank you so much.
